name: Finnish Association of Construction Product Industries
membership:
Finnish Association of Construction Product Industries (RTT) is  part of the Confederation of Finnish Construction Industries RT (CFCI) being the joint interest organisation of building contractors, special contractors and the construction product industry.
www.rakennusteollisuus.fi
goal: Finnish Association of Construction Product Industries (RTT) is  part of the Confederation of Finnish Construction Industries RT (CFCI) being the joint interest organisation of building contractors, special contractors and the construction product industry. RTT representing around 120 members of construction product manufacturers focuses its activities on business and industrial affairs. In addition RTT is a standard writing body of Finnish Standards Association (SFS) responsible of ISO and CEN standardisation in the field of building construction.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Public Health
euInitiatives: Circular economy, resource efficiency, energy efficiency, construction and demolition waste, chemicals, dangerous substances, ETS, CPR
